channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Tribe
channel.desc: Explorer Bruce Parry takes part in the initiation rite of the Babongo tribe of Gabon. Contains graphic scenes of drug use.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Eileen Atkins Remembers... Mrs Dalloway
channel.desc: Dame Eileen Atkins tells the story of her lifelong fascination with Virginia Woolf and recalls how she took on the challenge of adapting Woolf's Mrs Dalloway for the big screen.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Mrs Dalloway
channel.desc: An adaptation of the classic Virginia Woolf novel. A woman struggles to come to terms with the amorous feelings that a close platonic friend clearly holds for her.
